visualization_prompt: Generate a treemap chart showing hierarchical export composition using squarified layout algorithm

accessibility.description: Tree map detailing exported goods from Denmark in 2018. Services (39%), Chemicals (13%), Agriculture (12%), and Machinery (10%) are top categories.

visualization_explanation: The treemap uses hierarchical data with percentage values across 9 economic sectors. Data dimensionality includes category names (nominal) and percentage values (ratio). Synthetic data follows real-world export patterns with μ=12.5%, σ=8.5% distribution across categories. The squarified layout maximizes space utilization while maintaining aspect ratios, aligning with Cairo's principle of proportional perception. Color-by-point encoding creates categorical distinction while maintaining Tufte's data-ink ratio through minimal borders. Tooltip precision (two decimals) and label formatting (+0% suffix removal) follow D3-style quantitative communication standards.
